R0091.title: Game Account Laundering
R0091.definition: Stealing game account credentials through trojans or other hacking methods, then transferring in-game currency and items to the attacker via transactions for profit.
R0091.description: Account laundering methods are varied and include but are not limited to: stealing account credentials through illegal means to log in and extract virtual items and currency; exploiting vulnerabilities in game systems or related systems to intrude into accounts; and fraud or malicious programs to deceive users into giving up credentials or to attack accounts and extract virtual assets.
R0091.influence: Damages the platform's gaming ecosystem and causes losses to players' virtual assets.
